name: Delpon Alpha Trial
description:
Alpha Demo Trial For The Upcoming FPS Multiplayer Game "Delpon"

Delpon is a modern multiplayer FPS indie game that includes 3 different joyful game modes: battle royal mode, zombie attack mode, and free-for-all  mode.

Also it has flixible gameplay and such high quality refreshing assets

Play The Alpha Trial Right Now !

------------------------------------------------

Recommended hardware requirements :

GTX1650/RX570

i5-10010/Ryzen 3

8 Gb Ram

8 GB Storage

------------------------------------------------

Minimum hardware requirements :

GT750/RX270

i3-4150

6 GB Ram

8 GB Storage

------------------------------------------------
